name: REINFORCEMENTS: EVOLVED
description:
REINFORCEMENTS: EVOLVED is a Sci-fi FPS game created in Unity. 

ACT QUICK

The enemy are quick to kill you, so act quick and use your reflexes.

SHOOT FAST

Shoot and kill the enemies before they kill you.

CONSERVE

Conserve your health and ammo. Give yourself a breather.

A demo is available for download if you want to try the game out before purchasing it. Be aware that there are less features and the full experience isn't included. The demo only contains one level.
